Name: Flaming Dr Pepper
Instructions: LAYER amaretto and rum in chilled shot glass by carefully pouring amaretto and then rum.
IGNITE the rum and carefully lift shot glass then drop (bottom first) into Boston glass. PLEASE EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION!
Review: Please consider the likelihood of burning yourself while attempting to lift the flaming shot into the beer.
History: So named as the end result resembles the taste of the proprietary Dr. Pepper soft drink. This drink inspired an episode of The Simpsons featuring a similar drink titled the 'Flaming Homer' and later the 'Flaming Moe' (after the program's bartender).
Nutrition: One serving of Flaming Dr Pepper contains 328 calories
